heading: API Reference
content: The QuantConnect REST API lets you communicate with our cloud servers through URL endpoints.

featureShortDescription.02: Create, read, update, and delete projects
featureShortDescription.03: Create, read, update, and delete files from a project
featureShortDescription.04: Compile codes for backtest and live trading
featureShortDescription.05: Create, read, update, and delete backtests from a project
featureShortDescription.07: Create, read, and update live algorithms
featureShortDescription.09: Create, read, update, and delete files from the object store
featureShortDescription.10: Use AI tools to assist with coding tasks
featureShortDescription.11: Generate reports for backtests to evaluate performance
featureShortDescription.99: Examples of using the API with Jupyter Notebooks
